/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -std=c++1y -g   -shared -Wl,-soname,libardrone.so -o libardrone.so CMakeFiles/ardrone.dir/libardrone.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ardrone.dir/src/message_client.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ardrone.dir/src/classes/pid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ardrone.dir/src/classes/pid_rp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ardrone.dir/src/classes/pid_y.cpp.o -lpthread /opt/boost_1_57_0/lib/libboost_thread.so /opt/boost_1_57_0/lib/libboost_system.so /opt/cvdrone/lib/libcvdrone.a -lavdevice -lavutil -lavfilter -lswscale -lavformat -lavcodec -Wl,-rpath,/opt/boost_1_57_0/lib
